Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu I'd prefer we only use Epics for large user-facing features. I've closed this one for now. For grouping and tracking build, CI, and release tasks, I'd suggest using a search filter, and then if you like we can create a Jira 'Board' which enables ranking the tasks 1 through N via simple drag and drop in the list.
